name: new
description: Creates a new Aurelia application project.

parameters.name: project-name
parameters.description: The name to create the project with. If one isn't provided, the wizard will ask for one.

flags.name: here
flags.description: Creates a new project with the current working directory as the root of the project instead of creating a new project folder.

flags.name: plugin
flags.description: Creates a new Aurelia plugin project.

flags.name: unattended
flags.description: Creates project in unattended mode. It will fail if there is any conflicting file in target folder.

flags.name: select
flags.description: Preselect features (e.g. --select cli-bundler,alameda,karma). In unattended mode, these overwrite default-esnext selections. In interactive mode, some questions will be skipped because they are pre-answered.

flags.name: install-deps
flags.description: Auto install dependencies using yarn or npm (e.g --install-deps yarn)
